items.title: BYD extends Tesla-beating sales streak to four straight quarters
items.description: BYD managed to outsell Tesla on a quarterly basis even despite registering its first total sales decline in 18 months in September

items.title: RBI proposes to ease foreign borrowing rules for firms
items.description: The RBI's proposal allows firms to raise up to $1 billion or 300% of net worth, whichever is higher

items.title: Wockhardt applies to seek USFDA nod for ‘miracle’ antibiotic Zaynich
items.description: The Mumbai-based company  is eyeing a US launch in FY27, marking a pivotal moment for Indian pharma innovation.

items.title: September auto sales: From slowdown to surge
items.description: Robust festive demand and GST impact drive growth across segments

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick: This NBFC is set for re-rating as regulatory overhang eases
items.description: The company reported healthy loan growth and a marginal uptick in margins in Q1FY26 results

items.title: Vedanta extends deadline for demerger to March next year
items.description: The deadline was earlier extended from March 31, 2025 to September 30 this year.
